title: Keyboard shortcuts not working

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
The linked match I just played.  In it, no matter what I tried my keyboard shortcuts would not work.  Nor could I successfully register the shortcuts to different keys.  I tried exiting and reconnecting to the game mutiple times, until I was so far behind it was laughable, and still never got them to work.

I have no idea what happened.  this is not the first time my shortcuts haven't worked, but each time before this, I could fix the problem by exiting the game and reconnecting.  That didn't work this time.  I would really appreciate some help to fix this, if possible, so it doesn't screw me over again.  Please?

Thank you.

replies.body: It's hard to say what's causing this, but it sounds like there could be an issue with your game files not syncing properly to the game server.  This could happen if game files have been modified or re-configured.   Hit up our tech team by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to look further into this.  I also recommend gathering a set of logs which can be automatically obtained through the [hextech repair tool.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs)  We'll respond asap!
